name: semantic-column-mcp-server
description: MCP server exposing semantic column prediction and parsing tools over project CSV files.

tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List available CSV data files in the project.

tools.name: column_prediction
tools.description: Predict the semantic type of a column in a CSV file.

file_path.description: Path to the CSV file, relative to the project root (e.g. 'data/phone.csv').

column_name.description: Name of the column to classify.

tools.name: parse_file
tools.description: Parse the best PhoneNumber or CompanyName column in a CSV using parser.py and return the output file path.

file_path.description: Path to the CSV file, relative to the project root (e.g. 'data/phone.csv').
